coreAtributes.name: sissy bra
coreAtributes.description: A low-cut bra that reveals a lot of the wearer's cleavage. This particular design is made from a soft, thin fabric, and has a lot of lace trimmings.

displacementText.playerSelf: You slide your bra's straps off your shoulders before tugging it down to reveal your [pc.breasts+].
displacementText.playerNPC: You slide [npc.her] bra's straps off [npc.her] shoulders before tugging it down to reveal [npc.her] [npc.breasts+].
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You slide [npc.her] bra's straps off [npc.her] shoulders before jerking it down to reveal [npc.her] [npc.breasts+].
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] slides [npc.her] bra's straps off [npc.her] shoulders before tugging it down to reveal [npc.her] [npc.breasts+].
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slides your bra's straps off your shoulders before tugging it down to reveal your [pc.breasts+].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] slides your bra's straps off your shoulders before jerking it down to reveal your [pc.breasts+].
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] slides [npc2.her] bra's straps off [npc2.her] shoulders and pulls it down to reveal [npc2.her] [npc2.breasts+].
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] slides [npc2.her] bra's straps off [npc2.her] shoulders and jerks it down to reveal [npc2.her] [npc2.breasts+].

displacementText.playerSelf: You slide your bra's straps off your shoulders, unclip the catch behind you, and remove it to reveal your [pc.breasts+].
displacementText.playerNPC: You slide [npc.her] bra's straps off [npc.her] shoulders, unclip the catch at [npc.her] back, and remove it to reveal [npc.her] [npc.breasts+].
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You slide [npc.her] bra's straps off [npc.her] shoulders, pop the catch at [npc.her] back, and jerk it off to reveal [npc.her] [npc.breasts+].
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] slides [npc.her] bra's straps off [npc.her] shoulders, unclips the catch at [npc.her] back, and removes it to reveal [npc.her] [npc.breasts+].
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slides your bra's straps off your shoulders, unclips the catch at your back, and removes it to reveal your [pc.breasts+].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] slides your bra's straps off your shoulders, pops the catch at your back, and jerks it off to reveal your [pc.breasts+].
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] slides [npc2.her] bra's straps off [npc2.her] shoulders, unclips the catch at [npc2.her] back, and removes it to reveal [npc2.her] [npc2.breasts+].

replacementText.playerSelf: You slide your bra's straps up to your shoulders, clip the catch behind you, and adjust it to cover your [pc.breasts+].
replacementText.playerNPC: You slide [npc.her] bra's straps up [npc.her] shoulders, clip the catch behind [npc.her], and adjust it to cover [npc.her] [npc.breasts+].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You snap [npc.her] bra's straps on [npc.her] shoulders, clip the catch behind [npc.her], and adjust it to cover [npc.her] [npc.breasts+].
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] slides [npc.her] bra's straps up [npc.her] shoulders, clips the catch behind [npc.her], and adjusts it to cover [npc.her] [npc.breasts+].

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull your bra back up to cover your [pc.breasts] and slide the straps over your shoulders.
replacementText.playerNPC: You pull [npc.her] bra back up to cover [npc.her] [npc.breasts] and slide the straps over [npc.her] shoulders.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You yank [npc.her] bra back up to cover [npc.her] [npc.breasts] and snap the straps on [npc.her] shoulders.
